code: @Test @DirtiesContext public void testRouteUsingBean() throws Exception {     endpoint.expectedMessageCount(1).     endpoint.message(0).body().isEqualTo("Hello World").     producer.sendBody("World").     endpoint.assertIsSatisfied(). }
@Handler public String someMethod(String body) {     return "Hello " + body. }
@Override public void configure() throws Exception {     from("direct:start").errorHandler(deadLetterChannel("mock:end")).bean(new SomeBean()).to("mock:end"). }

@Bean @Override public RouteBuilder route() {     return new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             from("direct:start").errorHandler(deadLetterChannel("mock:end")).bean(new SomeBean()).to("mock:end").         }     }. }
